mapper.insert: insert into chatlog(uid, challenge_id, content, regist_date) values (#{uid}, #{challenge_id}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: select c.uid, c.content, c.regist_date, u.nick_name from chatlog c left outer join user u on c.uid = u.uid where c.challenge_id = #{challenge_id} order by chatlog_id desc limit 0, 200
